subject: Re: perl CBT
body:
On Jun 27, 8:42 am, mani_nm...@yahoo.com (Mani Kandan) wrote:

>   Is there is availabilty of PERL Computer based tutorial, if so where is it available ?

There are several.  Head to http://learn.perl.org and start reading
Beginning Perl (free online book).  Install Perl and run the command
`perldoc perl`.  Head to http://perldoc.perl.org and just start
reading.

(btw, one of the first things you should learn is that the language is
spelled Perl, not PERL)

Paul Lalli
